page.title: 10Village Life
page.content: Marhamchurch Village is a very thriving self supporting community.Numerous clubs, Brownies, Scouts, Men's Institute, Choir, Cricket, Handbell Ringers, Over 60's, Women's Institute, Youth Club can find sufficient members and raise funds from traditional activities : jumble sales etc. A caring Parish Council endeavours to improve and modernise facilities to be enjoyed by the residents,although not everyone yet enjoys the luxury of a mains water supply. There is a Village Hall which serves the School and Playgroup during the day and various clubs and activities social and fund raising in the evening and at weekends.This is 80 years old and linked with Church Trustees.
